actions.description: Sell 5 <sprite name="steel"/> from your stores for gold.
Buy 5 <sprite name="steel"/> from the caravans.
Add 1 <sprite name="ar"/> to your army here (or form a new army).
Add 1 <sprite name="ma"/> to your army here (or form a new army).
Add 1 <sprite name="li"/> to your army here (or form a new army).
Add 1 <sprite name="hi"/> to your army here (or form a new army).
Add 1 <sprite name="lc"/> to your army here (or form a new army).
Add 1 <sprite name="hc"/> to your army here (or form a new army).
Add 1 <sprite name="ca"/> to your army here (or form a new army).
Add 1 <sprite name="ws"/> at this port.
Sell 5 <sprite name="leather"/> from your stores for gold.
Buy 5 <sprite name="leather"/> from the caravans.
Sell 5 <sprite name="mounts"/> from your stores for gold.
Buy 5 <sprite name="mounts"/> from the caravans.
Sell 5 <sprite name="iron"/> from your stores for gold.
Buy 5 <sprite name="iron"/> from the caravans.
Sell 5 <sprite name="timber"/> from your stores for gold.
Buy 5 <sprite name="timber"/> from the caravans.
Sell 5 <sprite name="mithril"/> from your stores for gold.
Buy 5 <sprite name="mithril"/> from the caravans.
Attempt to kill an enemy character in this hex; the agent returns to capital and may be wounded.
Attempt to wound an enemy character here; the agent returns to capital.
Turn an enemy character here into your double agent.
Turn an enemy character here into your double agent.
Raise the loyalty of the population center in this hex.
Lower the loyalty of the population center in this hex.
Lead your army to attack enemy armies or population centers in this hex.
Upgrade the fortification level of your population center here.
Obscure the area around your hex from enemy sight.
Reveal the area around your hex.
Create 1-3 <sprite name="mounts"/> at a friendly or aligned population center here.
Damage an enemy character in your hex with dark magic.
Smite an enemy character here; Nazgul are also halted.
Teleport this character back to your capital (not available to army commanders).
Expose a hidden population center in this hex.
Reveal a random unseen hex and its surroundings.
Blink to a random explored hex and reveal tiles based on mage skill.
Add 1 <sprite name="ma"/> to an owned population center here.
Clear doubles on allied characters here or reduce loyalty of a hostile/neutral PC.
Heal a wounded allied or aligned character in your hex.
Shift this PC's loyalty using fireworks (up if aligned, down if hostile).
Search this hex for hidden artifacts and claim one if found.
Reveal a hidden artifact's location and show its details.
Steal gold from the current population center.
Steal up to your agent rating in <sprite name="iron"/> from the current population center.
Steal <sprite name="leather"/> from the current population center.
Steal <sprite name="mithril"/> from the current population center.
Steal <sprite name="mounts"/> from the current population center.
Steal <sprite name="timber"/> from the current population center.
End this character's turn without taking another action.
Refund movement so this non-army commander can move farther this turn.
Reveal the surrounding hexes.
Engage a selected enemy army in this hex (no additional effect yet).
Encourage a friendly army here for several turns.
Stop a non-army enemy character in this hex from acting or moving next turn.
Freeze an enemy army in this hex, halting it for a turn.
Burn an enemy army in your hex, causing casualties.
Inflict magical casualties on an enemy army sharing your hex.
Halt an enemy character in this hex; Balrogs also take damage.
Gather rumours based on your emissary skill.
At an aligned NPC capital, swear allegiance to recruit them if their conditions are met.
Reveal the nearest enemy army and the nearby area.
Give a transferable artifact to a friendly character in this hex.
Drill your troops, improving army XP up to elite levels based on commander skill.
